1. msys

2. pacman -S nasm
//nasm-2.14.03rc2-win64.zip

3. config.guess  config.sub

====================================
./configure --disable-thread --disable-avs 
--extra-ldflags=-Wl,--output-def=libx264.def
--enable-win32thread
====================================
./configure --enable-shared  --disable-win32thread --disable-avs 


make
